alert.note: Alert for Benton; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 11:40PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Benton, northwestern Madison and northeastern Washington Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1140 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from War Eagle to 6 miles north of Elkins to 3 miles east of Fayetteville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Huntsville... Elkins... Hindsville... Wesley... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Japton... Goshen... Georgetown... Larue... Alabam... Crosses... Best... Sonora... Tuttle... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
